snippet.title: Not for Broadcast: Lights, Camera, Lockdown
snippet.description:
You can Play Not For Broadcast right now : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147550/Not_For_Broadcast

Meet the team behind the award-winning, satirical, propaganda simulator 'Not For Broadcast' - a Full Motion Video TV sim with a cast of over 150 actors - as they reveal how exactly they managed to produce two, video-filled updates of their game during a global pandemic.
